# aifeedr

The goal of aifeedr is to functions to interact with an LLM to generate
feedback for data science assignment questions based on a rubric.

## Installation

You can install the development version of aifeedr from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("mine-cetinkaya-rundel/aifeedr")
```

## Usage

Users primarily use this package via the RStudio addin `Get feedback`.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`get_feedback()`](https://mine-cetinkaya-rundel.github.io/aifeedr/reference/get_feedback.md)
  : Capture selected text and launch Shiny app for feedback
- [`get_feedback_call()`](https://mine-cetinkaya-rundel.github.io/aifeedr/reference/get_feedback_call.md)
  : Call the Gradio backend
- [`get_hostname()`](https://mine-cetinkaya-rundel.github.io/aifeedr/reference/get_hostname.md)
  : Get the container hostname we are running inside
